MR Accessories
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: May 2013 Topics: MR Accessories
By CoopsieDaisy on Friday, May 3, 2013 - 12:44 pm:

Hey there! Nice to meet you guys. I've been a big
Monster Rancher fan since I was a kid. Now, my
hobby is resin crafting. I like to make things
like Pokemon
badges, Digimon crests and other
wearables, magnets and such.

But now for the life of me I cannot think of
anything good to craft that reflects my love of
Monster Rancher! The only idea I can think of is
using a disc stone as a pendant. Does anyone else
have any neat ideas?

By Lisa Shock on Friday, May 3, 2013 - 02:15 pm:

You could make some monsters, like Monol, Gali, Disc...the flat ones...

Or make medals with the logos of the various MR2 in-game tournaments.

By OgreBattle on Saturday, May 4, 2013 - 12:38 pm:

Here's an idea: pendants with the monster's type logo from MR4. Like, when you go to the encyclopedia and go to a monster's section and it'll show you (breed type) x (breed type), you should do those logos! they're simple enough I think.

By Kuwabara54 on Saturday, May 4, 2013 - 05:12 pm:

You could even go as far as making
pendants that resemble the technique
symbols for monsters. Yellow for power
and green for intelligence. I know most
of us have favorite techs and there are
many that are much more popular than
others so you could narrow it down to
just a couple for each breed

By CoopsieDaisy on Tuesday, May 7, 2013 - 02:34 pm:

Oooooh, I like those ideas! Especially the breed
type ones. They're designed specifically to be
simple so they're practically asking for it. Same
with the techniques, depending on which one it is
(some of them I was never able to visually figure
out in the
game itself, haha!).

Thanks everybody!

By OgreBattle on Tuesday, May 7, 2013 - 02:57 pm:

Keep us posted on any that you create! I would love to see the finish product, and even buy them on a website like Etsy if you plan to sell them.

By CoopsieDaisy on Tuesday, May 7, 2013 - 04:21 pm:

Oh, I'd love to collect a little extra money that
way! I'm not sure what the rules are on copyright
and such though. I'll check this out! :)

By Shen the Keeper on Friday, June 21, 2013 - 08:46 am:

Cross-Stitch.

It works especially well for MR sprites. I know they don't appear as often in late games, but Monster Rancher was oddly a big part of my motivation for picking up cross stitching.

Now the back of my phone has a Tiger jumping out from a monster disc seal.
